name: Frantic Fanfic
description:
IT'S FANFIC WITH FRIENDS!

>>> https://franticfanfic.com/  <<<

A brand spankin’ new creative writing party game where friends furiously write each other’s fanfiction: Frantic Fanfic.

This game takes inspiration from the classic writing game “pass the story” with a nerdy pop-culture twist. Frantic Fanfic is a fandom-frenzied supercharged mess of exposition, rising action, falling action, resolution and everything in-between!

You’re gonna need at least three friends. Plays best with four or more players, but three is fine. Frantic Fanfic is a round-robin style story game that is like exquisite corpse but for fanfiction. Here's the quick start guide!

QUICK START GUIDE

  1. Write some characters.
  2. *CHARACTER SHUFFLE-O-MATIC*
  3. Pick two characters to write about.
  4. Write the beginning starring those characters.
  5. *FANFIC SWAP* continue the middle part of someone else's fanfic.
  6. Another *FANFIC SWAP*. Write the ending of a different fanfic.
  7. Title your work.
  8. Take turns reading your fanfics!
  9. React! The more reacts you hit, the more points that part gets. Yes even the poop react is worth 100 points.
  10. Award your favourite fics with bonus points!

The stories and writers that get the most reacts and bonus votes are the winners!

We currently have three game modes. STANDARD, OTP VERSION and SELF INSERT mode. We have plans for a few more but that's all for right now :) Have fun!
